medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe dyspnea (New York Heart Association Class IV)
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely, with severe dyspnea noted on admission. Duration and specific progression details are not provided. No aggravating or relieving factors mentioned.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient was diagnosed with mucopolysaccharidosis (MPS) in infancy, specifically type II (Hunter's syndrome).
medical_history.family_history: Sister informed that the patient was diagnosed with MPS.
